name: SERENITY Ov BALL
description:
Fast-paced Devil Might Cry FPS action featuring 3 LUNATIC WEAPONS, combos, teching, parkour movement and more. You might eventually reach the top of the SKYSCRAPER HIGH SKILL CEILING if you really like a 25~ minute baby's first game that much.

The deadly playboy gangster computer god controlled villain RICHAD CIGAR has newly built (claimed) a brand new (ancient) facility for fun and profit.  YOUR ambiguously divine mission is to find RICHAD CIGAR and eliminate him, but his many (secretly cloned) noseless goons will attempt to butcher you on your way there. Use their own weaponry against them. A pair of legs has been placed deep in the fecal bowels of the facility. CIGAR will not let you kill him without a fight.

Good luck.

Featuring music by Viko

Controls:

WASD or Arrows - Movement

C or Control - Crouch and Slide

Q - Kick

F - Fire Head Mounted RPG

Scroll Wheel or Numbers - Swap Weapons

Left Mouse Button - Light Attack

Right Mouse Button - Heavy Attack

P - Revive

Made in Godot 3.3.2 using a myriad of tutorials. (Also buckets of blood, sweat and tears.
